Name: Frequency of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' followed by 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Percentage of manuscripts with 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' that proceed to 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion'
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion'

Name: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all submission-related activities
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases

Metric: Frequency of activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' followed by 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' within the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed'

Name: Number of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' that are followed by 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' in manuscripts that are eventually accepted ('RW-EIC Accept')
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'RW-EIC Accept'

Name: Frequency of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' for manuscripts that require major revisions compared to those that require minor revisions
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' leading to 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activity
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Number of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' followed by 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' for cases where activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' in cases that are eventually rejected ('SW-EIC Reject')
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'SW-EIC Reject'

Name: Frequency of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' in relation to the total number of activities in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases

Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Metric: Frequency of activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' for cases where activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurs

Metric: Number of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities
